entry.title: Israel Readies for Ground War in Gaza
entry.content: The Israeli military massed forces for a ground invasion of Gaza as Israeli officials warned of a lengthy and destructive war, amid fears in the Middle East of a broader regional conflict.

entry.title: Israel Sought to Contain Hamas for Years. Now It Faces a Potentially Costly Fight to Eliminate It
entry.content: Israel is preparing an operation intended either to decisively end Hamas’s hold on Gaza or gut the group’s military capabilities entirely.
